<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Reflexive Catch](/Feats.aspx?ID=1190) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 74</row>

**Archetype** [Juggler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=36)

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); [Juggler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1187)

**Trigger**
An item falls within your reach or an attacker fails an attack roll to hit you or a creature within your reach with a thrown weapon.

**Requirements**
The item or thrown weapon is of a Bulk you can [Juggle](/Feats.aspx?ID=1199). If the trigger was a thrown weapon attack targeting you, you can’t be [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the attack. If you were already Juggling, you can’t be Juggling your maximum number of items.

</column>

---

You grab the triggering item. If you are Juggling, you can immediately add the item to the objects you’re Juggling as a free action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) and [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) traits.
